pkgmetadata.longdescription: # together_worker## Setup dev```consolemake install```## Publish to PyPiGitHub repo > Releases > Draft a new Release > Choose a tag > Create new tag on publish >Name the tag using the current version from pyproject.toml with a "v" e.g. `v1.0.9`.> Publish ReleaseIn the repo toolbar select > Actions- Verify the publish workflow is running and completes successfully
